definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: You can buy your own calipers .
sentences.chinese: 你可以购买自己的卡尺。

sentences.english: Use of precision measuring tools, such as micrometers, calipers, etc.
sentences.chinese: 会使用量具，例如螺旋测微器，卡尺等。

sentences.english: Using vernier calipers , measure the slip ring diameter.
sentences.chinese: 用卡尺，测量滑环的直径。

sentences.english: Use the 5$ fat caliper from accumeasure.
sentences.chinese: 通过精准的测量，减去的是5$卡尺的脂肪。

sentences.english: Presents the common issues in using digital callipers.
sentences.chinese: 提出一些使用数字卡尺时常见的问题。

sentences.english: Section dimension should be measured by steel rule and calipers .
sentences.chinese: 截面尺寸应用钢尺和卡尺测量。

sentences.english: Use vernier calliper to measure the length, diameter of nerve root on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 借助游标卡尺测量两侧神经根的长度和直径。

sentences.english: The measurements of sebum thickness were made by B type ultrasonic diagnosis instrument and sebum thickness calipers respectively.
sentences.chinese: 用B型超声诊断仪和皮皱厚度卡尺分别测量皮脂厚度。

sentences.english: Using vernier calipers, measure the brush length.
sentences.chinese: 使用游标卡尺，测量电刷长度。

sentences.english: The dial calipers apply dial mechanism instead of vernier for readings and can work accurately and rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 带表卡尺是用表式机构代替游标读数，测量准确迅速。

sentences.english: The depth vernier gauges can be used to measure depth and step.
sentences.chinese: 深度游标卡尺用于测量深度，台阶等。

sentences.english: Infratemporal space and its adjacent structure were observed and its diameter and area were measured with vernier caliper and planimeter.
sentences.chinese: 利用游标卡尺及求积仪分别测量其径线和面积。

definition: set square (tool to measure right angles)

gauge that is held against an object to judge thickness, diameter etc, such as a feeler gauge, calipers etc/(abbr. for 評價量規|评价量规[ping2 jia4 liang2 gui1]) rubric (i.e. a guide listing specific criteria for grading)
